text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Bahraini press on Monday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Bahrain in new drive to find jobs for its nationals.
- Bahrain plans sports and leisure industry exhibition in September.
- Bahrain set to sign global ozone treaty.
- Pakistan to open a $1 million trade centre in Bahrain.
- National Import and Export Company doubles first half 1997 profits to 4.69 million dinars.
- Bahrain cabinet approves plan to set up light and heavy industrial projects on the island.
